abstract: Merck may be considering selling some veterinary medicine assets or the animal health business of Schering-Plough as it prepares to acquire the company.
snippet: Merck may be considering selling some veterinary medicine assets or the animal health business of Schering-Plough as it prepares to acquire the company.
lead_paragraph: Merck is considering selling some of its veterinary medicine assets or the animal health business of Schering-Plough, as it prepares to acquire its New Jersey neighbor, according to press reports.

headline.main: Merck May Sell Animal Drug Assets Before Merger
